channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaChat Release History
item.description: 7/17/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Fixed an issue where images sent by Messenger users could not be displayed properly. Fixed an issue where empty summary titles were still displayed on Messenger and Instagram when the transfer summary feature was not enabled. 7/10/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Workspaces page now mobile responsive: You can now access your workspace on your mobile devices and manage conversations.
